main event: A reddish-colored fast object, formed and four feet in diameter, was sighted near Fort Bragg, California on August 3, 1952.
interesting points: The object was described as flat in shape and estimated to be at an altitude of 5500 feet., The sighting was visually confirmed from the ground., There was a phone call received reporting several such objects in the area., The object was seen over Fort Bragg and observed multiple times during an hour's flight time., No sounds were heard from the object.
